text: Rustam Khojayev (born 2 January 1973) is a retired Tajikistani footballer and current manager. ==Career== On 21 August 2018, Khojayev was appointed as manager of FC Panjshir. On 5 January 2019, Khojayev was appointed as the new manager of CSKA Pamir Dushanbe. On 23 June 2019, Khojayev resigned as manager of CSKA Pamir Dushanbe. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Tajikistan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |1997||3||0 |- |1998||0||0 |- |1999||3||0 |- |2000||2||3 |- |2001||0||0 |- |2002||0||0 |- |2003||0||0 |- |2004||1||0 |- |2005||0||0 |- |2006||6||1 |- !Total||15||4 |} Statistics accurate as of 22 October 2015 ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
